ovdesc.p: The purpose of this file is to define Limits by Country or Group of Countries. The System does not attempt to provide real-time information about Country Limit utilisation. Instead, a report which shows all of the Country Limits and the use made of each is produced at a frequency as defined on the LIMIT.PARAMETER table.
If it is necessary to define Limits for a Group of Countries, such as the EEC or South America, then the Country Grouping is specified by the Limit Country Group table.

desc.p: Specifies the Currency in which the Limit is denominated.
3 character SWIFT code or 1-3 numeric character Currency code. Multivalue field associated with Fields 3 to 13. (Mandatory input when PRODUCT GROUP has been defined; otherwise not allowed).
Must be a valid code on the CURRENCY table.
Displays in the currency indicated in field 8 the total Outstanding amount contained in the last printed Country exposure report for the corresponding product group.
The details, in the original currency, of this amount will be displayed in fields 12 and 13.
Standard Amount Format. System generated field. Multivalue field associated with fields 3 to 13.
Defines the Limit Product Group(s) which is(are) to be part of the Country exposure.

The definition of the Product Groups in the LIMIT.COUNTRY table allows the user to identify the different products which, according to his own criteria, must be part of the Country exposure limit control.
3 to 17 characters type MNEMONIC. Multivalue field associated with Fields 4 to 13. (Mandatory input).
Input must be a valid Product Group on the LIMIT.PARAMETER table.
Duplicated Product Groups are not allowed.
Displays the Currency code contained in the last Country exposure report produced.

This field will always be the same as the LIMIT CURRENCY (Field 4) except if this one has been changed since the date on which the last country exposure report has been run. When the next Country exposure report is produced, it will then be the same again.
3 characters SWIFT code. System generated field. Multivalue field associated with fields 3 to 13.
Displays the Limit Amount contained in the last Country exposure report produced.

This field will always be the same as the LIMIT AMOUNT (Field 5) except if this one has been changed since the date on which the last country exposure report has been run. When the next Country exposure report is produced, it will then be the same again.
Standard Amount Format. System generated field. Multivalue field associated with fields 3 to 13.
Specifies the Currency in which the Outstandings in associated Field 10 are denominated.

During the overnight run, the total value of transactions for each Country Limit are totalled by Currency. Each Currency in which there are Outstandings has an entry in this field and the total Outstanding Amount for the Currency is held in associated Field 10. All these amounts are converted at the appropriate CURRENCY table middle rate.
3 SWIFT characters. Sub-value field associated with Field 13 and multivalue Fields 3 to 13. (Display only. This field cannot be input).
Displays the Product Group identification contained in the last Country exposure report produced.

This field will always be the same as the PRODUCT GROUP (Field 3) except if this one has been changed since the date on which the last country exposure report has been run. When the next Country exposure report is produced, it will then be the same again.
3 - 17 characters type MNEMONIC. System generated field. Multivalue field associated with fields 3 to 13.
Displays in the currency indicated in field 8 the total Available amount contained in the last printed Country exposure report for the corresponding product group.
The amount will represent the difference between REPRT LIMIT AMT (Field 9) and REPRT OUTSTANDG (Field 10).
Standard Amount Format. System generated field. Multivalue field associated with fields 3 to 13.
Defines, for the Country, or Group of Countries, the Limit amount applicable to the Product Group.
Up to 14 type AMT (standard amount format) characters. Multivalue field associated with Fields 3 to 13. (Mandatory input when PRODUCT GROUP defined; otherwise not allowed).
Indicates the total value of transactions, as at the production date of the last Country exposure report in the Currency specified by Field 12 for the corresponding Product Group.

During the overnight run, the total value of transactions for each Country Limit are totalled by Currency. Each Currency in which there are Outstandings has an entry in this field and the total Outstanding Amount for the Currency is held in associated Field 10. All these amounts are converted at the appropriate CURRENCY table middle rate.
Up to 14 type AMT (standard amount format) characters. Sub-value field associated with Field 7 and multivalue Fields 2 to 8. (Display only. Cannot be input.)
Specifies a unique key for each Country or Group of Countries for which a Limit, or Limits, are to be held.
A Limit Country record can be keyed into the System for each Country or Country Group for which Limits are to be kept.
2 type SSS characters valid Country code. 3 to 15 type A (alphanumeric) characters to identify a valid Country group. (Mandatory input.)
If the input is only 2 characters, these must be uppercase alpha and must be a valid Country Code.
If the input is more than 2 characters long, it must be the code of a valid entry on the Limit Country Group table.
Contains a free format description of the Country Limit.
3-35 type A (alphanumeric) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input.)
Allows a status to be associated with a Country Limit.
Up to 4 numeric characters CUSTOMER.STATUS code. (Optional Input; No Default value).
Any input must be a valid code on the CUSTOMER.STATUS table.
Allows a status to be associated with the Product Group.
Up to 4 numeric characters CUSTOMER.STATUS code. (Optional input; No Default value).
Any input must be a valid code on the CUSTOMER.STATUS table.
